column2: "Ahh, my friend! I have come into possession of a fact that I think you will be very interested to hear! Shall I tell you what it is?"

"Ahh, my friend! I have come into possession of a fact that I think you will be very interested to hear! Shall I tell you what it is?"
"When our affection for our beloved children deepens enough, it becomes possible for them to grow beyond their ordinary limits!"
"To put it in the simplest terms, a Pet whose rarity is 12 or higher can break its limit!"
"But how can this be done, you say, my friend? It would please me more than anything to show you! Now, let me speak to your children..."
"...Ah, how unfortunate. It seems that none of your Pets have reached a depth of affection that would permit them to break their limit. Speak with me again when your love for them has deepened!"
"Hmm... Ah, this is fantastic! Congratulations, my friend! You and your children have advanced to the next stage of your love!"
"Enjoy your new Summoner life! Until we meet again, my friend!"
"Hmm, perhaps my methods were deficient. It seems I could not fully convey your love to your children."
"Let us try again some other time! Next time, I promise you that I will show them just how completely you love them!"
"I see... You wish to tell them of your love yourself? ...But of course! That is an excellent idea!"
"But I am always willing to assist! When you grow interested in Limit Breaking, you have only to ask me!"
"The Pet's level limit has been increased."

"After asking Pietro for a \"Limit Break\",
you will be able to further level pets that have
reached Lv.100.

It's highly recommended to use high rarity eggs
to level pets after the Limit Break.
"
